name: Project: Midas 0.0.4 Pre-Pre-Alpha
description:
Thank you for checking out my game! It is in a VERY early prototyping phase so there really isn't a whole lot to do yet.

Controls:

W - Jump/Walljump/Wallrun (While on light grey background, press and hold w to start wall-running; release to stop and get a small boost of height)

S - Slide/Crouch

Left-click - Grapple (Click on a gold diamond to grapple to the surface, click again to detach)

Refresh the page to start from the beginning
